meaning_str.bing:
adv. 剧烈
adj. 激烈而不愉快的；充满愤怒与仇恨的；愤愤不平的；令人不快的
n. 苦啤酒（在英国很受欢迎）
v. 把…弄苦；变苦
网络. 苦的；痛苦的；苦味

激烈而不愉快的；充满愤怒与仇恨的；愤愤不平的；令人不快的
苦啤酒（在英国很受欢迎）

苦的；痛苦的；悲伤的；愤怒的；怨恨的；尖刻的；刻薄的；难以忍受的；愤愤不平的；令人不快的；令人不悦的
苦啤酒；苦精；苦味酒；苦味药剂；苦味添加剂；苦味调味剂；苦酒原汁

1.en: And I'm not trying to be giving you a bitter pill, no I. . . And I don't wanna make you promises I can't fulfill, no. . .
1.cn: 我还没有想给你提供一剂苦药，没有一…我不万讷使你的承诺，我不能履行，没有…

2.en: Chiang's book China's Destiny, which he wrote during the war, was a bitter denunciation of alien interference in his country.
2.cn: 战争期间，蒋在《中国之命运》一书中，颇为苦涩的谴责了外国人对其国家的干涉。

3.en: So she bought a bit of butter , better than her bitter butter, and she baked it is her batter, and the batter was not bitter.
3.cn: 因此，她买了一些比较优质的牛油，放进她的面糊里搅拌，面糊就不苦了。

1.en: Not to me. I have a very bitter taste in my mouth.
1.cn: 对我来说不是，我嘴里有股苦味。

2.en: She broke up with you? I hadn't heard that. See? All bitter... better.
2.cn: 她跟你提分手的吗？我没听过这事呢。看，太有事，没事了。

3.en: Go on phase two. Years of mandated hiding and silence have made us bitter.
3.cn: 进入第二阶段。多年来的躲藏和静默让我们萌生出不满。

4.en: I don't claim that. President Walker does. Oh, yes. A man made bitter by his own mistakes.
4.cn: 指控你的不是我，是沃克总统。是啊，那个自尝苦果心怀怨愤的男人。

5.en: Turns out recently, Andrew married Simon. My bitter rival from law school. Or nemesis? I've...
5.cn: 没想到，安德鲁最近跟西蒙结婚了。我在法学院的死敌，或者说…冤家？我已经…

6.en: Then one night, an unexpected intruder arrived at the castle, seeking shelter from the bitter storm.
6.cn: 一个风雨交加的夜晚，一位不速之客进入了城堡，想要避雨。

7.en: So what do we toast tonight, Minister Antonius? We toast to the glorious era coming to it's bitter end.
7.cn: 那么我们今晚到底庆祝什么，安东尼厄斯？我们要庆祝这峥嵘岁月终将以凄苦收尾。

8.en: Hey, don't bag on Sandra Bullock! You think it makes you look cultured, but you just come off as bitter.
8.cn: 喂，不许你说桑德拉·布洛克坏话！你以为这样显得很有内涵，但你表现出来的只是刻薄而已。

9.en: Which sister is this? Is this the spoiled one or the one bitter? Daddy cut me off. Never mind, I got it.
9.cn: 这是哪个妹妹？被宠坏的还是曾咬过她的？老爸断了我的财源。我知道了。

10.en: And this offer will enrage him, but I've shown his council, army and people that I'm a diplomat until the bitter end.
10.cn: 那么这个提议就会激怒他，但我已经向他的朝廷，军队和人民展现出我的外交家风度。

11.en: Add 10 grams each of salt and yeast to the mix and then some treacle, which adds a caramel bitter-sweetness and color.
11.cn: 再各加10克的食盐和酵母粉和匀加一些糖蜜，吃起来会更甜，颜色也会更好看。

12.en: Why not? Well, let's see, first of all, the prospect of ending up bitter and lonely drunk doesn't quite appeal to me. OK.
12.cn: 为什么不是？嗯，你看，首先，我可不想孤独老死，一人沉醉。好吧。

13.en: I am loving this country theme. This reminds me of when I worked for Newscenter Twelve in Tulsa, except no one here's bitter and drunk.
13.cn: 我超爱这个乡村主题！让我想起当初给塔尔萨市的十二新闻台工作的日子，除了这里没有刻薄的醉汉。

14.en: But the bitter truth we critics must face is that in the grand scheme of things, the average piece of junk is probably more meaningful than our criticism designating it so.
14.cn: 但我们评论家得面对难堪的事实，就是以价值而言，我们的评论，可能根本比不上我们大肆批评的平庸事物。

15.en: And you can use any other cooking wine, but I love Shao Hsing, from the Shao Hsing region in China. Just gives this gorgeous, bitter-sweet edge to any dish, and it just takes the rawness of meat or fish, and any odours off meat and fish.
15.cn: 你也可以使用其他料酒，但我爱用绍兴，中国绍兴地区产的绍兴米酒，可以让菜肴变得鲜美，苦中带甜，而且可以令肉或鱼更加入味，还能去除肉的腥味。

16.en: I know things have been weird lately, but you're like my oldest friend in the world, except for Laurie Schaffer, who I don't talk to anymore, 'cause she's all bitter now that she lost the weight and it turns out, she doesn't have a pretty face.
16.cn: 我感觉最近有点奇怪，你是我认识最久的朋友，除了萝瑞之外，我现在已经再和她说话，因为她虽已减肥成功，但是脸蛋依然丑陋。
